LivingSpaces.description: Individual rooms within shared apartments or houses.
Entire apartments shared by multiple tenants.
Shared living spaces for students or workers.
Houses available for co-living or partial rental.
Fully furnished spaces designed for shared living.

WorkSpaces.description: Spaces where multiple individuals or teams can work.
Creative spaces for art, design, or manufacturing.
Short-term, non-dedicated desks in co-working spaces.

RetailSpaces.description: Small spaces in markets or bazaars.
Spaces where multiple vendors can co-share a retail unit, dividing costs and maximizing usage.
Retail units in malls or high-street areas.
Short-term spaces for events, seasonal businesses, or experiments.
Compact retail setups in malls or transport hubs.
Spaces for mobile or semi-permanent food businesses.

StorageSpaces.description: Small spaces for individual storage needs.
Spaces for vehicles or larger items.
Extra storage within residential or commercial properties.

EventSpaces.description: Large spaces for weddings, parties, or gatherings.
Spaces for local events or group activities.
For photography, videography, or small productions.

RecreationalSpaces.description: Areas for personal or shared fitness activities.
Spaces suitable for childcare or recreational activities.
Dedicated spaces for crafts, music, or other hobbies.

MiscellaneousSpaces.description: For cars, bikes, or other vehicles.
Shared or rentable kitchens for catering or food prep.
Land for gardening or small-scale farming.
